optionalInfo.description: Optional extension information storing additional user attribute data

channelCode.description: Channel code, automatically generated by system

id.description: Category unique identifier ID, database primary key

muid.description: Modifier user ID, records user identifier who last modified this category

mtime.description: Modification time, records category last modification timestamp

status.description: Category status, indicates whether category is in active state

endpointCode.description: Endpoint code, automatically generated by system

model.description: Speech synthesis model name to use

speed.description: Speech playback speed, 1.0 is normal speed

response_format.description: Audio output format such as mp3, wav, etc.

memberUid.description: Member user ID to exit the space

protocol.description: Communication protocol type such as HTTP, WebSocket, etc.

entityType.description: Entity type such as MODEL or ENDPOINT
